content.raw:
I'm testing this branch with `ign-math4` and `ign-msgs1` but getting these cmake errors:

~~~
CMake Error at /home/osrf/code/ian/ign_ws/devel_isolated/ign_math/lib/cmake/ignition-math4/ignition-math4-config.cmake:55 (message):
  File or directory
  /home/osrf/code/ian/ign_ws/devel_isolated/ign_math/include/ignition/msgs1
  referenced by variable ignition-msgs1_INCLUDE_DIRS does not exist !
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /home/osrf/code/ian/ign_ws/devel_isolated/ign_msgs/lib/cmake/ignition-msgs1/ignition-msgs1-config.cmake:120 (set_and_check)
  /home/osrf/code/ian/ign_ws/devel_isolated/ign_cmake/lib/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/IgnUtils.cmake:188 (find_package)
  CMakeLists.txt:68 (ign_find_package)
~~~

it's looking for a weird path: `.../ign_math/include/ignition/msgs1`.  Has anyone seen this?
